Tag.description: Creates a key-value pair for a specific resource.

Key.description: The name assigned to the tag that you create.

Value.description: Contains one or more values that you assigned to the key name you create.

Description.description: A textual description for the agreement.

ServerId.description: A unique identifier for the server.

LocalProfileId.description: A unique identifier for the local profile.

PartnerProfileId.description: A unique identifier for the partner profile.

BaseDirectory.description: Specifies the base directory for the agreement.

AccessRole.description: Specifies the access role for the agreement.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the agreement.

Tags.description: Key-value pairs that can be used to group and search for agreements. Tags are metadata attached to agreements for any purpose.

AgreementId.description: A unique identifier for the agreement.

Arn.description: Specifies the unique Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the agreement.

PreserveFilename.description: Specifies whether to preserve the filename received for this agreement.

EnforceMessageSigning.description: Specifies whether to enforce an AS2 message is signed for this agreement.

CustomDirectories.description: Specifies a separate directory for each type of file to store for an AS2 message.

FailedFilesDirectory.description: Specifies a location to store the failed files for an AS2 message.

MdnFilesDirectory.description: Specifies a location to store the MDN file for an AS2 message.

PayloadFilesDirectory.description: Specifies a location to store the payload file for an AS2 message.

StatusFilesDirectory.description: Specifies a location to store the status file for an AS2 message.

TemporaryFilesDirectory.description: Specifies a location to store the temporary processing file for an AS2 message.
